metadata.title: CVE-2023-52658 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: Revert"net/mlx5: Block entering switchdev mode with ns inconsistency" Thisreverts commit 662404b24a4c4d839839ed25e3097571f5938b9b. The revert isrequired due to the suspicion it is not good for anything and cause crash.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
